long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open your video, click in download transcript, extension will download a .txt file with the transcription of the video that you can use to provide ChatGPT or any AI tool and summarize videos or come up with new scripts learning from your favorite youtubers.
